name: Configuration / Support
description:
[BP-10161](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10161 )

*Available on iOS 16.2+.
*Live activity initiated by opening the app with a game event ticket - section/row/seat will be displayed.
*Live activity can be dismissed, but reopening the app, or retriggering a home call, will make it appear again.
*Clicking on a live activity will deep link directly to a scan view for both Ticketmaster and TDC clubs.

name: Display
description:
Current Logic:
*Activity can start 2 hours before all the way up to 3 hours after.
*"Auto-dismiss" now only happens when you open the app 3 hours after game start. Otherwise the activity can potentially sit on the user's lock screen for 12 hours after the activity starts. (12 hour time is an Apple limit)

(so would need to change the device date/time to fall in the appropriate window)

name: Forward
description:
[BP-10291](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10291 )
Introduced with 12.3.3 

*LA to dismiss upon COMPLETING a forwarding of a ticket
  **PENDING ticket will show LA until accepted by recipient
*LA will dismiss if user has no ACTIVE ticket
  **if multiple tickets are present, LA should display section/row/seat info for Active ticket ONLY
